results.name: Expansion of (1 - 3x)/(1 - x + x^2).
comment: Row sums of number triangle A117372.
Periodic sequence with period {1, -2, -3, -1, 2, 3}. - _Philippe Deléham_, Nov 03 2008
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,-1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) - a(n-2); a(0)=1, a(1)=-2. - _Philippe Deléham_, Nov 03 2008
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 3 x)/(1 - x + x^2), {x, 0, 200}], x] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 11 2011 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 10 2006
